system.controller

Class CursorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • system.model.LVSObject
      • system.controller.CursorController

  • public class CursorController
extends LVSObject
    This class is the controller which control the action perform on cursor by java.awt.Robot. Functions allow system to transmit user motions or controls to native system input events.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Andy Tsang
